Configuration.StudyNameEntrez: Exome Chip Study of NIMH Controls
Configuration.StudyNameReportPage: Exome Chip Study of NIMH Controls
Configuration.Description: Here, we report exome chip genotyping results of 1052 samples from the NIMH control set, a collection of healthy controls for general research use. The samples are all unrelated.
Configuration.StudyInEx: DNA quality was assessed by Picogreen quantification. SNP concordance and gender concordance checks were used to confirm that no significant contamination by foreign DNA was present and the samples were consistent with reported NIMH listed genders.
